import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update view schedules"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/views/{viewId}/schedules"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Replaces the schedule configuration for a saved view. This endpoint overwrites the existing schedules array with the one you supply, enabling exports or emailed deliveries on a cadence.

**Prerequisites**
1. **viewId** - Obtain from a list endpoint such as [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views) or [GET /api/v1.0/views/for-sites](/docs/api/views/list-site-views).
2. **Schedule template** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/views/get-view-definition) to inspect current schedule objects before replacing them.

**Workflow Example**
1. Fetch the current view definition: [GET /api/v1.0/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/views/get-view-definition).
2. Build a new schedules array (enable/disable or update delivery settings).
3. [POST /api/v1.0/views/\{viewId\}/schedules](/docs/api/views/update-view-schedules) with the schedule array to replace existing schedules.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `viewId` (path). For each schedule: `ViewScheduleId`, `SiteId`, `ProductId`, `ViewId`, `IsEnabled`, `IsMultiRowExportEnabled`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"viewId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Identifier of the view to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Schedule configuration used to email or export view results on a cadence.","properties":{"ViewScheduleId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the schedule record.","example":"eb3232a7-9600-4d0d-b0a8-39a7d13bb2d0"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site that owns the schedule.","example":"0d17ca20-6cb3-4e55-8258-8c0bf0d8c9c4"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product context for the view.","example":"8b8af5ec-3ac6-4f67-8a9a-6f2654572f8f"},"ViewId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the view the schedule is attached to.","example":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2"},"IsEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the schedule is currently active.","example":true},"LastRunDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"Timestamp of the last export run."},"NextRunDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"Projected timestamp for the next run."},"RecurringScheduleId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the recurring cadence definition."},"RecurringSchedule":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Recurring schedule definition that governs when the template auto-creates tickets.","properties":{"RecurringScheduleId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the recurring schedule definition.","example":"99999999-9999-9999-9999-999999999999"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site that owns the recurring schedule.","example":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e"},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the schedule was created.","example":"2024-12-01T15:00:00Z"},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the schedule definition was last updated.","example":"2024-12-01T15:00:00Z"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the recurring schedule shown in the UI.","example":"Monthly on the first school day at 8:30 AM"},"Pattern":{"type":"string","description":"Describes how often the template runs.","enum":["Daily","Weekly","Monthly","Quarterly","Yearly","Once"],"example":"Monthly"},"StartTime":{"type":"string","description":"Local start time of day when the schedule fires (HH:mm:ss).","pattern":"^\\d{2}:\\d{2}:\\d{2}$","example":"08:30:00"},"StopRecurringDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"Optional end date after which the recurring schedule stops generating tickets.","example":"2025-09-30T00:00:00Z"},"RRule":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Raw RRULE expression when advanced recurrence is configured.","example":""},"RRuleJson":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"JSON-encoded recurrence metadata used by the web application.","example":""},"IsValidMonthlyPattern":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the monthly recurrence pattern is valid.","example":true},"IsValidQuarterlyPattern":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the quarterly recurrence pattern is valid.","example":true},"IsMonthlyInstanceBased":{"type":"boolean","description":"True when the schedule uses week-instance rules (e.g., 2nd Tuesday).","example":false},"RunOnceDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"For one-time schedules, the exact timestamp when the template will run.","example":"2025-02-10T08:30:00Z"},"WeeklyDays":{"type":"integer","description":"Bitmask representing selected weekdays (1=Sunday, 2=Monday, etc.) for weekly recurrences.","minimum":0,"example":18},"MonthlyDay":{"type":"integer","description":"Calendar day of the month when the template should run (1-31). Value 0 indicates the pattern uses instance-based logic instead.","minimum":0,"maximum":31,"example":1},"MonthlyDayInstance":{"type":"integer","description":"Week instance (1=first, 2=second, etc.) used when the schedule is instance-based.","minimum":0,"example":1},"MonthlyDayWeekDay":{"type":"integer","description":"Weekday identifier (0=Sunday .. 6=Saturday) used with instance-based monthly schedules.","minimum":0,"maximum":6,"example":1},"YearlyMonth":{"type":"integer","description":"Month (1-12) when the yearly schedule should run.","minimum":0,"maximum":12,"example":7},"YearlyDay":{"type":"integer","description":"Day of the month for a yearly schedule. A value of 0 indicates the pattern uses instance-based rules.","minimum":0,"maximum":31,"example":15}},"required":["RecurringScheduleId","SiteId","CreatedDate","ModifiedDate","Name","Pattern","StartTime","IsValidMonthlyPattern","IsValidQuarterlyPattern","IsMonthlyInstanceBased"],"title":"TicketTemplateRecurringSchedule"}],"description":"Full recurring schedule pattern attached to the view schedule."},"ViewScheduleTypeId":{"type":"string","description":"Schedule type key describing the delivery method (for example, `Email`).","example":"ViewSchedule.Email"},"ExportHost":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Hostname for the export destination when using FTP/SFTP delivery."},"ExportPort":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Port used for exporting through FTP/SFTP."},"ExportUid":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Username used to authenticate to the export destination."},"ExportPwd":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Password used to authenticate to the export destination."},"ExportPath":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Directory path where exported files are dropped."},"IsMultiRowExportEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the export should include one row per related record.","example":false},"ExportFormat":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Export file format (for example, `csv`)."},"FilterSetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the saved filter set applied when the schedule runs."},"ExternalUserEmails":{"type":"array","description":"Optional collection of external recipients who should be emailed the export.","items":{"type":"string","format":"email"},"example":["reports@incidentiq.com"]}},"required":["ViewScheduleId","SiteId","ProductId","ViewId","IsEnabled","IsMultiRowExportEnabled"],"title":"ViewSchedule"}},"example":[{"ViewScheduleId":"eb3232a7-9600-4d0d-b0a8-39a7d13bb2d0","SiteId":"0d17ca20-6cb3-4e55-8258-8c0bf0d8c9c4","ProductId":"8b8af5ec-3ac6-4f67-8a9a-6f2654572f8f","ViewId":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2","IsEnabled":true,"IsMultiRowExportEnabled":false}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
